a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Children per woman vs. average years of schooling, 2010
Note: The total fertility rate is the number of children that would be born to a woman if she were to live to
the end of her child-bearing years and give birth to children at the current age-specific fertility rates.
Data source: Fertility rate (Complete Gapminder, v12) (2017), Lee and Lee (2016)
